full_summary:
CONTRACT DETAILS ENGLISH FRENCH
**Contract Title** RISO Fire Extinguisher Maintenance - Gagetown, NB OCIR Services Maintenance d'extincteurs - Gagetown, N.-B.
**Contract Reference** W0501-23C005/A W0501-23C005/A
**Tender Status** **Closed** Closed**
**Procurement Information:** * **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP) * **Trade Agreements:** CETA/WTO-AGP/CPTPP/CFTA/FTAs with Peru/Colombia/Panama/Korea/UK * **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding * **Selection Criteria:** Lowest/Lowest Price * **Trade Agreements Requirements:** Compliant with all applicable trade agreements **Delivery and Performance:** * **Regions of Delivery:** New Brunswick * **Delivery Date:** January 03, 2023 to January 02, 2024 * **Optional Extensions:** Up to two (2) additional one (1) year periods **Application Instructions:** * **Form of Application:** All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on November 10, 2022 by 2:00 pm AST. * **Late Submissions:** All bids submitted after 2:00 pm AST will be declared non-responsive. **Contact Information:** * **Contract Authority:** Maryse Cyr, maryse.cyr@pwgsc.gc.ca * **Office Contact:** telephone: (506) 377-4894, fax: (506) 851-6759 **Additional Information:** * **GSIN Services:** JX4210 - Firefighting Equipment - Repair and Overhaul * **Compliance with Regulations:** Compliant with all applicable Canadian laws and regulations Please note that the rewritten entry includes only the essential information and adheres to a more professional tone.
